short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension adding Fresh Fruit search engine to Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to set the Fresh Fruit search engine as your primary search provider in the address bar.
Fresh Fruit search engine is an alternative search engine with the ability to search for content in various sources with an emphasis on user privacy.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Fresh Fruit Tab and setting Chrome search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings provided by Fresh Fruit Tab.

Terms of Use: https://freshfruittab.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://freshfruittab.com/privacy.html
